title: Chapter 322.2: The Owner
body:
Chapter 322.2: The Owner

Qing Cheng looked over curiously. What was he trying to do in this sort of situation? Baili Yu had better not cause more trouble, otherwise he really wouldn’t know what to do.There were Wind Cherishing Houses all over the country. If he didn’t deal with this incident appropriately, it would affect Wind Cherishing House’s reputation. Incidents like this spread like wildfire in street gossip.As he was thinking this, Baili Yu had already walked off the stage and over to Tang Doudou.
